knimeNode.name: Get Interaction Fingerprint
knimeNode.shortDescription: Knime node to retrieve the interaction fingerprints (IFPs) from specific structures from KLIFS

fullDescription.intro: Knime node to retrieve the interaction fingerprints (IFPs) from specific structures from KLIFS
fullDescription.option: Select the input column with the structure IDs

ports.outPort: Protein-ligand interaction fingerprints for each protein-ligand complex
